author: wn.com
title: Snap decisions: More happiness gained by using Snapchat than Facebook (University of Michigan)
text: ( Source : University of Michigan ) ANN ARBOR-Snapchat use actually predicts more social enjoyment and positive mood than Facebook and other social media, according to a new University of Michigan study. And the only interaction more rewarding
